## Understanding Replication and Reproducible Research
- Pashler, H., & de Ruiter, J. P. (2017). [Taking Responsibility for Our Field’s Reputation](https://www.psychologicalscience.org/observer/taking-responsibility-for-our-fields-reputation). APS Observer, 30(30/8).
    - [Cognitive Area Brownbag Discussion 09/06/2017](https://github.com/psu-psychology/cog-bbag-2017-18/blob/master/2017-09-06-Pashler-de-Ruiter.md)

- Benjamin, D. J., Berger, J., Johannesson, M., Nosek, B. A., Wagenmakers, E.-J., Berk, R., Bollen, K., et al. (2017). [Redefine statistical significance.](https://psyarxiv.com/mky9j/download?format=pdf) PsyArXiv.
    - [Cognitive Area Brownbag Discussion 10/11/2017](https://github.com/psu-psychology/cog-bbag-2017-18/blob/master/2017-10-11-p-lt-005.Rmd)

- Lakens, D., Adolfi, F. G., Albers, C., Anvari, F., Apps, M. A. J., Argamon, S. E., van Assen, M. A. L. M., et al. (2017). [Justify Your Alpha: A Response to “Redefine Statistical Significance.”](https://psyarxiv.com/9s3y6/download?format=pdf) PsyArXiv.
